DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to determine if probiotic prophylaxis has immunologic and gastrointestinal advantages in pediatric burn patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Culturelle in the Prophylaxis of Infection and Diarrhea
DOC.criteria: acute burn injury consented within 10 days of injury feeding tube present GI disorder prior to burn milk allergy or insensitivity nonburned
